body:
While a native connection is always best, we've used an Epson Document Camera (purchased off eBay) for iPhone/iPod presentations in the past and plan to do so next month for our iPad preso. For a NEW one I'd look at the Elmo brand. 
Our epson can go to the Projector AND S-Video out simultaneously so that we can capture the feed using an EyeTV device for our recordings. Again, quality is what it is, but it does work for us. 
 
See our meeting using this method here: 
http://macgroup.libsyn.com/index.php?post_id=551661 
Time Marker 01:08:10 into the movie
